conceptUnit.description: An explanatory or conceptual unit primarily consisting of paragraphs and optionally images or quotes.

taskUnit.description: A step-by-step procedural unit consisting of ordered lists and optionally paragraphs or code blocks.

referenceUnit.description: A structured reference, typically represented by tables or code blocks.

codeExampleUnit.description: A unit primarily providing code examples, possibly accompanied by explanatory paragraphs.

summaryUnit.description: A brief summarizing unit that includes paragraphs or quotes without complex structures.

imageUnit.description: A visual unit centered around images, potentially supported by brief captions or paragraphs.
